MovieWatson
item.description:
• Built a movie recommendation system that instantaneously captured user preference without needing user data history.
  • Utilized collaborative filtering system as well as database retrieval method to provide recommended 10 movies.

item.title: how social media influence human emotion
item.description:
• Designed an android App to collect real-time data that tracked user happiness.
  • Used statistics to reveal the relationship between users happiness and the time spent on social media.
